sub_title: International Sales Director | VP Business Development | Fraud & ID | Cybersecurity | Payments at Available
summary:
Experienced International sales leader in online payments, e-commerce and online Fraud

M +31614951440 - E vantienenpieter@gmail.com  - available 

In working for companies like eBay, PayPal, WorldPay and Experian I have developed myself to be a sales and sales leadership professional in the field of online payments, e-commerce and online fraud.

Value-based selling, hard work, integrity and good interpersonal skills are, I believe, the basic ingredients to achieving desired results. This has been my basic philosophy in the several roles I have been carrying out during my career.

For many years I have been responsible for my own personal target, and I have led international sales teams of up to 15 fully targeted individuals. In the end the principles are the same;

• Working together with people,
• Setting goals which are clear, objective, measurable and realistic,
• Define and agree on a plan of action,
• Execute, Evaluate and Improve.

I work this way whether I work with my team, with business partners or with a target of my own, and it has been proven a success.

Living the international life

Feeling like a true global citizen, I have lived, worked and studied in several countries worldwide. Paris, where I studied French and French literature and Martinique, in the heart of the Caribbean, are some of the many places that have influenced me to become the person I am today. 

Nowadays, work brings me virtually every month to another destination within the EMEA region, so I have learned to connect to and negotiate with many different cultures. Regularly, I speak on industry events, lead workshops and participate in panels to build the brand I represent and to further strengthen my professional network.

I balance out my busy professional life by spending time with my children, family & friends and practising yoga.
